title: VanMoof’s new ebikes are part of a masterplan to become the Tesla of two-wheelers
content:
VanMoof has long been described as the Tesla of electric bikes and with the announcement of its newest vehicles — the S5 and A5 — the company wants to continue following the trajectory of Elon Musk’s automaker. On paper, VanMoof is in with a good shot. Over the past couple of years, it raised $182 million (second only to Rad Power) and has emerged as, arguably, the most popular ebike brand. Or, at the very least, the most talked about company in the space — whether that’s good or bad. With the S5 and the A5, VanMoof wants to move…

This story continues at The Next Web

Or just read more coverage about: Tesla
description: VanMoof has announced its new electric bikes: the S5 and A5, two vehicles it hopes can make it the Tesla of urban mobility.
